name: WenteVineyardsWineTasting
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: virtual wine tasting
des: Make time to join Wente Vineyards for a tasting of three of our most popular wines. Learn the history behind one of California’s most important wineries dating back to 1883. Discover the story of the first family of chardonnay as you enjoy the widely loved Wente Riva Ranch Chardonnay. Learn the basics of tasting, then taste one or all three wines, discussing the aromas and flavor profile.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
